title: HOW DOES MY DO NOT DISTURB GO ON WITHOUT ME REQUESTING? ELLIOT
content:
NOTHING, MY DO NOT DISTURB COMES ON SOMETIMES WITHOUT ME ASKING FOR THIS
ALSO, SOMETIMES I CANNOT ANSWER THE PHONE, IT RINGS BUT THE ICON DOESN'T APPEAR TO ANSWER. THGIS HAPPENS ALL THE TIME. VERY FRUSTRATING?
WHAT'S THE PROBLEM
